description: Telefilm Canada is seeking services for an Appian architect and analyst to support several projects...
duration_in_months: math open to interpretation based on actual response time and evaluation process of the proposals received.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
===========================

**SRV-1823-001: Request for Proposal**
--------------------------------------

**Category:** Information Technology Services
**Negotiation Process:** Competitively Bid

**Description:**
Téléfilm Canada is seeking an Appian Architect and Analyst to provide expert services for the following projects:

* Project CAB: Telefilm Canada's Principal System (Dialogue) to support project financing, re-launches, and new programs for the Canada Media Fund (CMF)
* Project CORPO: Corporate Initiatives, such as Diversity & Inclusion, to integrate requirements into the Dialogue system

**Key Requirements:**

* Appian expertise and experience
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
* Ability to integrate diverse requirements into the Dialogue system

**Notice Details:**

* **Solicitation Number:** ITS202302-001
* **Publication Date:** February 13, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** March 1, 2023, at 1:00 pm EST
* **Contact Information:**
	+ Nora Amer
	+ Telefilm Canada
	+ offre.bid@telefilm.ca

**Attachments:**

* RFP Form (English): [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/13/1eb64be3ba40e0a8bf15498ecc7fd87f/telefilm_-_rfq_form_v4._it_appianarchitect_en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/13/1eb64be3ba40e0a8bf15498ecc7fd87f/telefilm_-_rfq_form_v4._it_appianarchitect_en.pdf)
* Demande de propositions (French): [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/13/2f1e64d8f73f831ce1b0d2ab030b944e/telefilm_-_dp_form-it_appianarchitecte_fr.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/13/2f1e64d8f73f831ce1b0d2ab030b944e/telefilm_-_dp_form-it_appianarchitecte_fr.pdf)

**Trade Agreements:**

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Contracting Entity:
